message: Let's split it 50/50, it's a fair start!
I'll take the majority, you get a smaller share, but it's a good start
I'll give you a bigger share, but I need to get a decent amount too!
I'll take a bigger share, but you'll get something, don't expect more
I'll give you most of it, but I need something to survive
I'll take almost all, you'll get a tiny bit, don't expect a handout
I'll give you most of it, but I need something to hold onto
You're getting desperate, I'll take almost all, you'll get peanuts
I'll give you almost all, but I'll get something, even if it's tiny
You're running out of options, I'll take almost all, you'll get a tiny crumb
I'll give you almost everything, but I'll get something, even if it's just a fraction
You're out of options, I'll take it all, you'll get nothing
